3.6.0.0.message: add support for consumer group scoping

3.3.0.0.message: Fixed an issue with the `echo` option, which caused the plugin to not return the `uri-captures`.[#10390](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10390)

3.1.0.0.message: The plugin no longer allows setting `status_code` to `null`.[#9400](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/9400)
